metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9847 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. When the user does not specify ablowfish_secret key for encrypting cookies, phpMyAdmin generates one atruntime. A vulnerability was reported where the way this value is createduses a weak algorithm. This could allow an attacker to determine the user'sblowfish_secret and potentially decrypt their cookies. All 4.6.x versions(prior to 4.6.5), 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.9), and 4.0.x versions(prior to 4.0.10.18) are affected.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
